issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

4th gen ipod running 4.1, 3g iphone 3.1.2 .5.0.77ad8ac

1.controls>text field>textfield in scroll view
2.tap into the top most field to invoke keybard
3.scroll down to reveal the text field on the bottom (labeled "bottom")
4.tap in and watch field

result:it forces the field off screen, then it scrolls back
expected: no animation, field is visible, just invoke keyboard.

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: Text field in scroll view - with keyboard up, tapping into the bottom most field forces it offscreen, then back onscreen

Successful iOS Simulator and iOS Device test on 01/25/2011

  • iOS Simulator Results: no animation, field is visible, just invoke keyboard.

  • iPhone Results: no animation, field is visible, just invoke keyboard.

Mobile SDK version: 1.6.0 (01/25/11 13:33 1f1dd51...)

Simulator Version: 4.2 (235)
